sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A meruaylous straunge deformed swyne. I. P. Philips, John, fl. 1570-1591. Partridge, John, fl. 1566-1573. Pitts, John, fl. 1559-1577.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcut).
by VVilliam Hovv, for Richard Iohnes: and are to be solde at his shop ioyning to the southwest doore of Paules Churche., Imprinted at London : [1570?]
Signed at end: I.P.; Variously attributed to John Philips, John Partridge and John Pitts. Cf. STC. Publication date suggested by STC. Partly in verse. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcut).
by VVilliam Hovv, for Richard Iohnes: and are to be solde at his shop ioyning to the southwest doore of Paules Churche., Imprinted at London : [1570?]
Signed at end: I.P.; Variously attributed to John Philips, John Partridge and John Pitts. Cf. STC. Publication date suggested by STC. Partly in verse. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Richard Iohnes:
VVilliam Hovv
his shop ioyning to the southwest doore of Paules Churche.
